decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A001, A002, A002P, A004, A201, A202. Noise Assessment by Sharps Redmore Acoustic Surveyors. Cover letter from JLL dated 30/04/2015. All received on 21/05/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The level of noise emitted by all fixed plant on the site shall not exceed (44dB LAeq at any time during the day (07: 00 - 23:00) and shall not exceed 37 dB LAeq during at any time during the night (23:00 - 07 :00). The noise levels shall be determined at the nearest noise sensitive properties in Harrow Road. The measurement and assessment shall be made according to BS4142:2014.
description: Installation of new plant within an existing compound to the south of the warehouse
